ygData.subject: RE: Killed or Crashed in boat
ygData.msgSnippet: I used to crash once while sailing on boat (hand itchy, go try some option configuration when sailing).  When I relogin, I found myself at the bottom of the
ygData.messageBody:
I used to crash once while sailing on boat (hand itchy, go try some option
configuration when sailing). When I relogin, I found myself at the bottom
of the OOT. Tat time I'm a newbie at lvl 7 or so, no swimming skill. I
swim and swim until I see an isle and climb on it, fortunately no shark or
aqua goblin on me during the swiming, or I sure die, cant imagine how to
retrieve corpse in the huge OOT (and corpse will sink to the seabed). I
wait and page for GM for long long time but no one come. Lucky I can gate
at that time and gate back to Felwithe, if warrior I die man ;)

Now u guys know why I always max our my swiming to lvl ceiling, hehe. For
HE casters, u know we can access our guild either by swimming there or get
into the teleport house to teleport to guild. All I can say is tat, now I
can reach my guild faster by swiming than using the teleporter ;)

Ziltus
Champion Swimmer

On Sunday, 15 August, 1999 2:54 AM, Ken Yip [SMTP:typhoon@...]
wrote:
> From: Ken Yip <typhoon@...>
>
> This time i jialat liao i was at eruds crossing and fighting wisps then a
fire ele
> attack me i ran to dock and saw a ship docked there so i went on it and
the fire
> ele did not attack me anymore so i sat down and went to toilet for awhile
when i
> come back i recive the message u have been slain by a fire ele and then i
thought
> my corpse on the boat lor so i waited for the 2 ships and try to summon
my corpse
> but cannot me= in deep shit all stuff lost :(
>
>
> Sereph wrote:
>
> > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> >
> > Whole journey, done it thousands of times by now:
> >
> > Erudin->Qeynos->Qeynos Hills->West Karanas->North Karanas->East
Karanas->High
> > Hold(or Beholder's Maze)-> Kithicor Forest(or Runnynose->Kithicor
Forest)->West
> > Commanlands->East Commonlands->West Freeport.
> >
> > At most, I create a shaman/druid, get high enough to cast SOW on you,
then you
> > run loh.
> >
> > "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> > >
> > > ok... heres my experience... hehe (believe it or not i actually
created a
> > > erudite wizard and travel all the way to freeport)... heres how i do
it...
> > >
> > > first, take the boat inside erudin to qeynos... this isnt too
difficult...
> > > except u have to take note that u will be transferring from a small
one to a
> > > large one then take u to qeynos... from qeynos... u will prolly need
some
> > > help... fer a low level becos its like 10-11 zones apart... i asked
someone
> > > to help me out and surprised that i managed to find one...
> > >
> > > Amenda
> > > Level 3 Erdite Wizard
> > > p/s : prepared for a 3 hours trip.
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

Cleric
> > > I met

> > > > >
> > > > > Money all came from Lesh one, you think my gu niang bard that
rich meh?
> > > Can get
> > > > > full bronze for my cleric.
> > > > >
> > > > > Anyway, night blindness is VERY severe for humans races in
outdoors.
> > > Can't see
> > > > > a damn thing even with the brightest object you have. That's why
I never
> > > ever
> > > > > fully played a human character in EQ. In dungeons, it is not so
bad
> > > though.
> > > > > When you create your new wiz, give me and Kell a tell. We help
you PL
> > > with mes
> > > > > and healing.
> > > > >

time
> > > for my
> > > > > > Ziltus liao, how to spare time for other server? ;)

107) is
> > > more
> > > > > > than 200 mana points lesser than a erudite wiz of max INT (and
I think
> > > at

Very

> > > > > > start a new wiz char once Ziltus hit lvl 30 (Zil can help new
char to
> > > get
> > > > > > item to make him start off, just like tat gu niang Fesse who
start a
> > > lvl 1

hehe).
> > > > > >

to FP
> > > and
> > > > > > meet u guys. Can anyone tell me how to take boat from Eru city
to Q
> > > city
> > > > > > and run to FP?
> > > > > >
> > > > > > I guess I will get him a large light stone to start off with,
> > > preferably
> > > > > > with water crystal staff and JK skull, plus all useful circle 1
and 2
> > > > > > spells, ful clothes amor and some cheapo jewelries from
Kellendil,
> > > hehe.
> > > > > > (quite easy to get from lvl 1 to 4 in a night, tried in Prexus
b4).
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Btw, with so many kakis making new chars, we better have
another round
> > > of
> > > > > > roster list liao ;) Hey when is the next newbie hunt? ;)
